wordpressPost.title: Breast implant disease
wordpressPost.content:
Breast implant disease.  Have you ever heard of it?  I just read an interesting article in an alternative health book.  I thought is was worth sharing if you have breast implants or are thinking of getting them.

The article says that regardless of the type of implant that a person has (saline, silicone, etc.) most women will probably develop health problems because the bodies white blood cells breakdown the implant coating.

The body literally chews off little pieces of the silicone casing and then carry the pieces into another area of tissue where where the white blood cells dies but, not before releasing foreign material in the tissue.

The point of the article is that ALL implants release foreign material no matter what type of implant there is and even, when they are not ruptured.

Get this, Dr. W. Lee says that it is estimated that  the release is up to five grams per year!! Scary..

Here is why implants may hurt us.

“Silicone is a sensitizing agent, which means it initiates an autoimmune or hyper-immune process.” Which causes our own white blood cells to attack our bodies which can manifest itself as an autoimmune disorder like chronic fatigue, MS, or lupus.

It can also cause memory loss, poor concentration, arthritic pain, and other disorders.

Something worth thinking about before getting breast implants or maybe getting “un-implanted” if you have them and you have symptoms.

Before you go, I created “The 7 Steps to Rejuvenate and Renewal.” In just seven

steps you can feel amazing without depriving your self!  Click the link below:

THE REJUVENATION AND RENEWAL PLAN
